flares.upgraded: Place 1 common piece of your color on any empty square.
flares.pieces: You may do 1 combat move or 2 standard moves, using your non-legendary pieces.

legends.name: The Eldest Tree
legends.text: On up to 3 adjacent squares: if it has an enemy non-legendary piece, destroy it; if it has your common piece, upgrade it; if it is empty, place 1 common piece of your color there.

legends.name: Time Elemental
legends.text: After this turn, take an extra turn (even if the end of the game has been triggered).

faction_cards.name: Ritual Keeper
faction_cards.text: If the Ritual Keeper was summoned on a green square, upgrade one of your common pieces; if on a red square, you may do 1 combat move with 1 of your pieces.

faction_cards.name: Hill Giant
faction_cards.text: Destroy all non-legendary pieces on orthogonally adjacent squares.

faction_cards.name: Eagle Lord
faction_cards.text: The Eagle Lord may do a combat leap to any square of the board.

tasks.name: Central Dominance
tasks.text: You have at least 5 pieces on the nine central squares, and at least 2 of them are upgraded.

tasks.name: Side Chain
tasks.text: Squares on two opposite sides of the board are connected by a chain of your pieces.

tasks.name: Heroic Destruction
tasks.text: You destroyed at least 3 enemy pieces this turn, at least 1 of them upgraded.

tasks.name: Envelopment
tasks.text: You have at least 7 pieces adjacent to the same enemy piece.
